New Records: Dinesh Karthik smashed a maiden fifty in Twenty20 internationals.
Key Match Events: South Africa managed to reach only 87 for nine in 16.5 overs.
India plundered 73 runs from the last five overs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's captain Temba Bavuma retired hurt after suffering blows to his hand and body.
Quinton de Kock was run out after returning from injury.
India played without several frontline players including Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, and KL Rahul.
